name: wrd-bawag-mfa
author: BAWAG P.S.K.
description: parent module of we are developers projects

scripts.bootstrap: npm run bootstrap:cl && npm run bootstrap:proxy && npm run bootstrap:login  && npm run bootstrap:quiz  && npm run bootstrap:tic-tac-toe  && npm run bootstrap:statistics  && npm run bootstrap:profile
scripts.start:cl: cd wrd-cl && npm run serve:prod && cd ..
scripts.start:proxy: cd wrd-proxy && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start:login: cd wrd-login && npm run serve:ext:prod cd ..
scripts.start:quiz: cd wrd-quiz && npm run serve:ext:prod cd ..
scripts.start:tic-tac-toe: cd wrd-tic-tac-toe && npm run serve:ext:prod cd ..
scripts.start:statistics: cd wrd-statistics && npm run serve:ext:prod cd ..
scripts.start:profile: cd wrd-profile && npm run serve:ext:prod cd ..
scripts.start:cl:mock: cd wrd-cl && npm run serve:prod:mock && cd ..
scripts.start:login:mock: cd wrd-login && npm run serve:ext:mock && cd ..
scripts.start:quiz:mock: cd wrd-quiz && npm run serve:ext:mock cd ..
scripts.start:tic-tac-toe:mock: cd wrd-tic-tac-toe && npm run serve:ext:mock cd ..
scripts.start:statistics:mock: cd wrd-statistics && npm run serve:ext:mock cd ..
scripts.start:profile:mock: cd wrd-profile && npm run serve:ext:mock cd ..
scripts.kill:proxy: cd wrd-proxy && npm run kill && cd ..
scripts.kill:login: cd wrd-login && npm run kill cd ..
scripts.kill:quiz: cd wrd-quiz && npm run kill cd ..
scripts.kill:tic-tac-toe: cd wrd-tic-tac-toe && npm run kill cd ..
scripts.kill:statistics: cd wrd-statistics && npm run kill cd ..
scripts.kill:profile: cd wrd-profile && npm run kill cd ..
scripts.kill:cl: cd wrd-cl && npm run kill && cd ..
